alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 4:04PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern York, northeastern Rockingham and southern Strafford Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 403 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Northwood, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Portsmouth, Durham, Kittery, Northwood, Dover, Somersworth, Barrington, Berwick, Barnstead, South Berwick, York, Newington, Wells, Eliot, Lee, Deerfield, Madbury, Nottingham and Strafford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 1 and 18. Interstate 95 in New Hampshire between mile markers 15 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
